definition: to sweep/to clean with a brush/to sweep away (often fig.)
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
to sweep away evil/to purge (the world of crime)

sentences.english: I've been as busy as a bee all day doing my spring - cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 大掃除使得我一整天一直忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: Two Spider man were cleaning the glasses of my libary.
sentences.chinese: 孜知書院大掃除，請來了兩個蜘蛛俠。

sentences.english: Application accessibility is all about removing the obstacles for users who have disabilities.
sentences.chinese: 應用程序可訪問性是指爲殘障人士掃除使用障礙。

sentences.english: I was just doing some spring-cleaning. How do you think my office is looking?
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛做了大掃除，你覺得我們辦公室看上去怎麼樣？

sentences.english: His spiritual depression came to an end when she kissed him.
sentences.chinese: 她的親吻掃除了他精神上的苦悶。

sentences.english: They first had a great house cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 他們首先給屋子來一個大掃除。

sentences.english: The students are clea majoring the clbummroom.
Students, be quiet, can you tell me who is the best one for toda…
sentences.chinese: 同學們，安靜下，告訴我今天掃除誰表現最好啊？

sentences.english: In your mind was being detained before you remove the cobwebs confinement.
sentences.chinese: 在你的心靈被禁錮之前，先掃除禁錮你的蜘蛛網。

sentences.english: By the time you get home, I wii have cleaned the house from top to buttom.
sentences.chinese: 你到家之前我將把屋子徹底掃除一遍。

sentences.english: Then they huddle around the kitchen hearth waiting for the first dawn of the bright New Year.
sentences.chinese: 他們在除夕也要大掃除，然後一家人圍在爐邊守歲。

sentences.english: After spring cleaning , all was shipshape and bristol fashion.
sentences.chinese: 春季大掃除之後一切都整整齊齊。

sentences.english: Li Ming or his acquaintances are charwoman the allowance.
sentences.chinese: 李明或者是他的同班同窗在掃除房間。

sentences.english: Second, we need to create a good environment and remove barriers to investment.
sentences.chinese: 二要創造良好環境，掃除投資障礙。

sentences.english: I'm going to spring-clean(the house) this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 這個週末我將進行大掃除。

sentences.english: In the spring-cleaning Mother forgot about the three guestroom upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 大掃除時媽媽忘了樓上的三間客房。

definition: to tidy up/to mop up/a sweep (against crime)
to introduce into/to channel/to lead/to guide into/to import (data)
to learn/to acquire (some skill through practice)/acquisition
preparedness/to bring sth to a state of readiness
housewife/woman of senior authority in a household/the lady of the house/hostess
variant of 熱衷|热衷[re4 zhong1]
